name: Nomzilla: Munching Mayhem
description:
Don't let the corrupted Humans celebrate their monster hunting festival, Enter their town and start a mayhem!
Created in 48hrs for Ludum Dare 33 with the theme "You are the monster"

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to Move
P - Pause
M - Mute
R - Restart

I cut some planned features and didn't implement some art mockups because I ran out of time. Maybe I'll continue working on the game later on and add the planned stuff and port it to mobile too.

Also, sorry about the short BGM loop, I really don't have any experience making game audio.
